content: Hello, I have completed the proof of Fin.cycleIcc(is the cycle (i i+1 .... j) leaving (0 ... i-1) and (j+1 ... n-1) unchanged.) and its properties, and I have submitted a PR here. Could you please help review it? Thank you very much. (P.S. This is my first time completing a PR independently, so there may be many issues.)
I know I shouldn't have created a new file for CycleRange, but when I tried to merge the code into the file where Fin.cycleRange is located, many places like cycleRange'._proof_3 caused errors.
Should it be cycleIcc to underline that it cycles Icc, not Ico?
it is a great suggestion, I will change it
